activities: Collaborative Solutions implements Workday, a cloud based Human Resources system for global companies.  In the course of these implementations we may view and access personal employee data from the customers we serve.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Our organization processes HR data for our clients.  The data is transferred to us via secure FTP, managed on encrypted hard drives and loaded into Workday, a password protected system licensed by the customer.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
